channel.title: Need a good coder, come and read!
channel.description:
[b]I've got, 317 or 474 [PI] ( Project Insanity )[/b]
Well, i need a good coder can code everythings..
I want to code like 10 things, here is a list:
1. Skill cape emotes & GFX.
2. I already made player clipping for following it worked, but now how do i make it clipped while attacking other?
3. Npc Clipped Followed
4. When i open the bank, so players can do ::dall (command) - to put all they items into the bank
5. Adding Sounds/Music systim
6. Vengeance Skull, i can veng but without SKULL
7. I need to code, if someone X - logged, to keep his account online for 2 mins
8. Add logs trade/drop folder
[hr]
That's all for now, if someone know anything here so please PM me here or add me on facebook and tell me or reply ur code here or anything, i really wants all these codes, and then i will make my server online, thanks anyway.
My facebook (This is not my real facebook, i just made this for working): https://www.facebook.com/mohtaz.ranger?fref=ts
